Customer Story

How Homey is Shaping the Industry with Leading Content

With more than 20 years of experience, Vault can deliver outstanding results for your online business with no extra costs or commitments.

item.title: From Struggling Website to Thriving Online Presence
item.dc:creator: srinivas
item.content:encoded:
Customer Story

From Struggling Website to Thriving Online Presence

San Ramon, California-based EdTech company focusing on coding and robotics for kids. They have a website, but they are not seeing much traffic or generating many leads through it. They are interested in improving their online presence and attractingmore qualified leads through their website.

Location

San Ramon, California

Industry

EdTech

Background

San Ramon, California-based EdTech company focusing on coding and robotics for kids. They have a website, but they are not seeing much traffic or generating many leads through it. They are interested in improving their online presence and attracting more qualified leads through their website.

Challenges

  • Highly competitive industry, with many other EdTech companies in same niche vying for top search engine rankings
  • The websites content was outdated and not optimized for search engines. Websites user experience was poor and the design was not SEO friendly.
  • The website has a high bounce rate, indicating that vrisitors are not finding what they are looking for and are leaving the site quickly

Grow your business today

Unlock your businesss full potential with innovative digital solutions, tailored strategies, and expert supportstart growing today with Stakque.

Contact Us

Strategies

  • Conduct keyword research to identify high-value keywords to target in the websites content and meta tags
  • Create and optimize new website content to better target target keywords and address the needs and interests of the target audience
  • Create location-specific SEO content for major cities and countries.
  • Build a topic cluster centered around a few potential keywords and create worldclass content on each topic.
  • Improve the websites on-page elements, including title tags, headings, and content, to improve its relevancy to target keywords
  • Build high-quality backlinks to the website to improve its authority and ranking in search engine results
  • Implement tracking and analytics tools to measure the effectiveness of the SEO efforts

Tactics

  • Create targeted blog content that includes target keywords and addresses the needs and interests of the target audience
  • Update the websites title tags and meta descriptions to include target keywords
  • Re-structure the websites navigation to improve the user experience and make it easier for users to find what they are looking for
  • Reach out to industry-relevant websites with high DA and build contextual backlinks.
  • Set up Google Analytics to track website traffic and conversions

Results

As a result of our efforts, they have seen a dramatic increase in website traffic, with a 974% increase over a period of 12 months. They have also experienced a 1480% increase in the number of qualified leads during this same time period. In addition to these impressive results, we also helped them to bring significant enhancements to the user experience on their website. Compared to the previous version, the website now loads 14 times faster, making it more enjoyable for visitors to use.

In terms of search engine rankings, we achieved outstanding results, with over 40 potential keywords ranked in the first position and over 500 keywords ranked on the first page of search results.

More customer stories

SEO

item.title: 746% Increase In Organic Traffic For A Homeo Hospital Website
item.dc:creator: srinivas
item.content:encoded:
Customer Story

746% Increase In Organic Traffic For A Homeo Hospital Website

Leading homeopathic clinic based in Malappuram, Kerala; they focus on providing high-quality homeo treatment for people across the world. The client reached out to us to implement an SEO strategy for their homeopathic services. The goal was to improve their brand recognition, increase clicks, and lead conversions.

Location

Malappuram, Kerala

Industry

Alternative Medicine

Background

Leading homeopathic clinic based in Malappuram, Kerala; they focus on providing high-quality homeo treatment for people across the world. The client reached out to us to implement an SEO strategy for their homeopathic services. The goal was to improve their brand recognition, increase clicks, and lead conversions.

Challenges

  • Strong competition in the industry
  • Low brand visibility on the first page of Google for potential, traffic-driving keywords
  • Struggling to rank for important keywords at the initial stage

Grow your business today

Unlock your businesss full potential with innovative digital solutions, tailored strategies, and expert supportstart growing today with Stakque.

Contact Us

Strategies

  • On-page optimization of the website
  • Building domain authority using social bookmarking links from high-authority relevant websites
  • Creating separate pages focusing on long-tail keywords with high relevant search volume
  • Strengthening technical SEO
  • Creating great content
  • Contextual link building

Tactics

  • Analyzing Google analytics and search console
  • Creating keyword-specific meta titles, descriptions, and keywords
  • Optimizing H1, Alt, canonical, and image tags
  • Utilizing tools like Semrush to identify ranking challenges and targeted keywords
  • Focusing on long-tail, conversion-focused keywords with low keyword difficulty and high search volumes
  • Creating SEO-friendly inner pages focusing on services and adding relevant keywords to content
  • Performing an SEO audit to identify problems and potential for improvement
  • Improving page load speed, adding alt tags to images, deleting duplicate content, and improving internal linking
  • Researching and targeting main keywords and phrases that competitors are ranking for
  • Building backlinks from high-authority websites in the industry

Results

In just six months, we were able to significantly improve their organic traffic, resulting in a 746% increase. Additionally, page clicks increased by over 1000%. They also saw 25+ potential keywords rank in the first position, which contributed to a 145% increase in conversion value. Overall, these results demonstrate the success of our efforts in improving the visibility and performance of the website.

More customer stories

SEO

SEO

item.title: 608% Increase In Organic Traffic For A Pet Cafe Website
item.dc:creator: srinivas
item.content:encoded:
Customer Story

608% Increase In Organic Traffic For A Pet Cafe Website

Location

Bengaluru

Industry

Pet Care

Challenges

  • Search Results were dominated by very strong competitors in the area (Bengaluru).
  • The site link profile was rather underdeveloped
  • Keyword Difficulty of target keywords was very high

Solutions

  • Ranked for too many semantic long-tail keywords
  • Restructuring website into SEO friendly one
  • Strategic link building to improve the overall domain authority of the website.
  • Implementing best SEO strategy according to the continuous analysis and monitoring

Grow your business today

Unlock your businesss full potential with innovative digital solutions, tailored strategies, and expert supportstart growing today with Stakque.

Contact Us

The business was just beginning when they came to us, they didnt have any brand recognition both online and offline. Online competitors for searches relevant to them were very strong.

That was just the initial stage of their marketing.

Their main obstacle to growth was how competitive the SERPs are for their core keywords.

The top 20 places for all but the most niche of long-tail keywords were dominated by their super-strong competitors such as Therpup, Raasta Cafe, Toit, and other blogging sites.

As a result of this competition, the brand had very little visibility on the first two pages of Google for key, traffic-driving terms and were struggling to rank at the initial stage.

Therefore our main campaign goals were to:

Push Core Keywords into the index:to rank in broad terms which have hundreds of thousands of combined searches each month.

Rank keywords that were ranked in other pages: to fetch keyword ranking reports and create a strategy for ranking in those keywords that are in a relatively better position.

Increase overall search visibility for the longer tail:rank in several long-tail conversion-based keywords that have hundreds of search volumes with low keyword difficulty. These represented a good quick win opportunity.

Ensure proper on-site optimization: to create relevant and unique content for best user experience based on E-A-T framework, proper URL structuring, image optimization, and header and content optimization.

Strategy And Implementation

  • The main strategy was to:

    • Extensively audit the website and make it SEO-friendly one.
    • Build the overall domain authority using links from high-authority relevant websites in same niche.
    • Create separate pages focusing long-tail keywords that have high relevant search volume.

RL Strcturing

During the auditing proces, we made it a major priority to ensure that the site will rank for as many relevant long tail keywords as possible.

While we were confident that the site would rank for broad, high-volume terms in the long term.

The quickest strategy to boost organic traffic and sales was to rank the site for more specialised terms.

These long tail keywords, if applied over their whole services that they provide, might result in a significant increase in organic traffic.

Therefore, we have created separate pages to target every individual potential long-tail keywords and structured the site and URL accordingly.

Page Structuring And Content

In order to improve each pages keyword relevancy, we revamped not only the title tags, but also leveraged other essential HTML components like header tags to target associated, semantically similar keywords around the core term.

We assisted in populating all of the services pages with rich, unique content added in a way that did not detract from the design of the site, or its ability to convert.

Results

With recommendation from the audit actioned in last July and implementation of strategy that was framed according to analysis of trend, traffic continuously grew month-on-month.

By January, organic traffic was up 608% compared to the previous July, with January receiving 1,772 visits compared to Julyss 250.

Similarly, the number of new users had increased by over 650%, with 1748 new visits in January compared to 233 in July.

Return Of Investment

We also optimized the website for conversion by proper placements of call to actions and lead forms. Also implemented conversion tracking from valuable visitor actions like lead form submission and clicks on call. Since the client shared a clear idea on the value of each conversion, we found a 342% increase in conversion value over six months, with 136 conversions.

Keyword Improvements



cross the 124 core keywords that we track in-house, there was an overall increase of 435 places.

A number of high volume keywords entered the first page, and a number of highly competitive terms entered the index and continue to rapidly ascend the SERPs.

More customer stories

Just 3 Months of SEO How We Generated Quality Leads for a Professional Training Institute
SEO

19x ROI: How a Company in the Electrical Equipment Manufacturing Industry Achieved 1 Crore Revenue with SEO in 6 Months
SEO

Winning Googles Top Spot in 3 Months: A Case Study in Beating E-commerce Giants

      The business was just beginning when they came to us, they didn\u2019t have any brand recognition both online and offline. Online competitors for searches relevant to them were very strong.<\/p>

      That was just the initial stage of their marketing.<\/p>

      Their main obstacle to growth was how competitive the SERPs are for their core keywords.<\/p>

      The top 20 places for all but the most niche of long-tail keywords were dominated by their super-strong competitors such as Therpup, Raasta Cafe, Toit, and other blogging sites.<\/p>

      As a result of this competition, the brand had very little visibility on the first two pages of Google for key, traffic-driving terms and were struggling to rank at the initial stage.<\/p>

      Therefore our main campaign goals were to:<\/p>

      Push Core Keywords into the index:<\/strong>\u00a0to rank in broad terms which have hundreds of thousands of combined searches each month.<\/p>

      Rank keywords that were ranked in other pages<\/strong>: to fetch keyword ranking reports and create a strategy for ranking in those keywords that are in a relatively better position.<\/p>

      Increase overall search visibility for the longer tail:<\/strong>\u00a0rank in several long-tail conversion-based keywords that have hundreds of search volumes with low keyword difficulty. These represented a good \u201cquick win\u201d opportunity.<\/p>

      Ensure proper on-site optimization<\/strong>: to create relevant and unique content for best user experience based on E-A-T framework, proper URL structuring, image optimization, and header and content optimization.<\/p>","ep_widget_cf_colors":"#D30C5C, #0EBCDC, #EAED41, #ED5A78,           During the auditing proces, we made it a major priority to ensure that the site will rank for as many relevant long tail keywords as possible.<\/p>

          While we were confident that the site would rank for broad, high-volume terms in the long term.<\/p>

          The quickest strategy to boost organic traffic and sales was to rank the site for more specialised terms.<\/p>

          These long tail keywords, if applied over their whole services that they provide, might result in a significant increase in organic traffic.<\/p>

          Therefore, we have created separate pages to target every individual potential long-tail keywords and structured the site and URL accordingly.<\/p>","ep_widget_cf_colors":"#D30C5C, #0EBCDC,           In order to improve each page\u2019s keyword relevancy, we revamped not only the title tags, but also leveraged other essential HTML components like header tags to target associated, semantically similar keywords around the core term.<\/p>

          We assisted in populating all of the services pages with rich, unique content added in a way that did not detract from the design of the site, or its ability to           With recommendation from the audit actioned in last July and implementation of strategy that was framed according to analysis of trend, traffic continuously grew month-on-month.<\/p>

          By January, organic traffic was up 608% compared to the previous July, with January receiving 1,772 visits compared to July\u2019s\u2019s 250.<\/p>

item.title: 375% Increase In Organic Traffic Leads To 210% Increase In In-Store Traffic For jewellery Store
item.dc:creator: srinivas
item.content:encoded:
Customer Story

375% Increase In Organic Traffic Leads To 210% Increase In In-Store Traffic For jewellery Store

Location

Benguluru

Industry

jewellery Store

Background

The client was a small jewellery store in a crowded retail market. They approached us with the goal of increasing their online presence and driving more traffic to their physical store.

Challenges

  • Strong competition from larger retailers with established online presences
  • Limited budget for marketing and advertising
  • Lack of brand recognition or reputation online
  • Limited resources for creating and maintaining an online presence

Grow your business today

Unlock your businesss full potential with innovative digital solutions, tailored strategies, and expert supportstart growing today with Stakque.

Contact Us

Strategies

  • Optimize the website for relevant keywords
  • Create high-quality, localized content
  • Build backlinks from reputable, local sources
  • Leverage social media platforms to engage with customers and promote the business
  • Implement a local SEO strategy to increase visibility in search results for the stores location

Tactics

  • Conducted keyword research to identify relevant terms for the jewellery stores products and services
  • Created and optimized website content for targeted keywords
  • Built backlinks from local sources such as chamber of commerce websites, community blogs, and local business directories
  • Created and maintained profiles on relevant social media platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, and Pinterest
  • Optimized the stores Google My Business profile and implemented local citations and reviews to increase local visibility
  • Utilized email marketing campaigns to promote sales and events

Results



Our efforts to increase the jewellery stores online presence yielded impressive results. In just four months, we saw a 375% increase in searches for the stores core keywords, leading to a 210% increase in in-store foot traffic. This resulted in a 35% increase in positive reviews and ratings on review sites, as well as a noticeable boost in sales and revenue for the store. Our efforts helped the store stand out in a crowded market and attract new customers through online channels.

More customer stories

SEO

SEO

item.title: Reducing Cost Per Lead by 91.63% at a Deemed-to-be University in South India
item.dc:creator: srinivas
item.content:encoded:
Customer Story

Reducing Cost Per Lead by 91.63% at a Deemed-to-be University in South India

Location

South India

Industry

Buildings

In this case study, we will be discussing how we successfully used a multi-armed bandit algorithm for AB testing on landing pages to reduce the cost per lead by 91.63% at a deemed-to-be university in South India. The brand faced a major challenge in terms of the high cost per lead for certain keywords, and needed to find a solution to this problem. By using a combination of landing page tools, an optimized landing page system, and the multi-armed bandit algorithm, we were able to achieve significant results in a short period of time. The following case study will outline the details of our challenge, the solution we implemented, and the successful results that we achieved.

About the Brand

Yenepoya Deemed-to-be University is one of the largest deemed-to-be universities in South India, offering a wide range of academic programs in various fields.

Our Challenge

We were facing a major challenge in terms of the cost per lead for some of our most important keywords, such as btech admissions in south India and similar ones. Despite our efforts, the cost per lead was extremely high and we needed to find a solution to this problem.

Grow your business today

Unlock your businesss full potential with innovative digital solutions, tailored strategies, and expert supportstart growing today with Stakque. Contact Us

The Solution

To address this challenge, we decided to use a multi-armed bandit algorithm for AB testing on our landing pages. We used two different landing page tools, Unbounce and another AB testing tool with the multi-armed bandit feature. The latter allowed us to automatically generate and test up to five variants at a time, saving us time and allowing us to conduct a controlled study.

In addition to these tools, we also created our own landing page system using WordPress, which was installed on high-frequency servers from Vultr. We used two layers of caching, Redis cache and Nginx FastCGI, to ensure fast loading times and good performance.

The Result

Within two weeks of implementing this solution, we saw a tremendous increase in the number of action takers on a specific variant. As a result, the cost per lead was reduced by 91.63%, from 800 rupees to 67 rupees, a significant improvement.

Conclusion

The use of a multi-armed bandit algorithm for AB testing on our landing pages proved to be an effective solution for reducing the cost per lead. By automating the testing process and using optimized tools and systems, we were able to achieve significant results in a short period of time.

More customer stories

SEO

SEO

In this case study, we will be discussing how we successfully used a multi-armed bandit algorithm for AB testing on landing pages to reduce the cost per lead by 91.63% at a deemed-to-be university in South India. The brand faced a major challenge in terms of the high cost per lead for certain keywords, and needed to find a solution to this problem. By using a combination of landing page tools, an optimized landing page system, and the multi-armed bandit algorithm, we were able to achieve significant results in a short period of time. The following case study will outline the details of our challenge, the solution we implemented, and the successful results that we achieved.<\/p>","ep_widget_cf_colors":"#D30C5C, #0EBCDC, #EAED41, To address this challenge, we decided to use a multi-armed bandit algorithm for AB testing on our landing pages. We used two different landing page tools, Unbounce and another AB testing tool with the multi-armed bandit feature. The latter allowed us to automatically generate and test up to five variants at a time, saving us time and allowing us to conduct a controlled study.<\/p>

In addition to these tools, we also created our own landing page system using WordPress, which was installed on high-frequency servers from Vultr. We used two layers of caching, Redis cache and Nginx FastCGI, to ensure fast loading times and good performance.<\/p>","ep_widget_cf_colors":"#D30C5C, #0EBCDC, #EAED41, #ED5A78, item.title: From Hacked and Slow to Fast and Efficient: Website Optimization Success Story
item.dc:creator: srinivas
item.content:encoded:
Customer Story

From Hacked and Slow to Fast and Efficient: Website Optimization Success Story

Location

South India

Industry

Buildings

In this case study, we will be exploring the optimization efforts that were undertaken to improve the speed and performance of the Abonemed Medical Equipment LLC website. The companys website had been hacked and filled with thousands of unwanted entries in the database, causing it to run slow and negatively impacting the user experience.

To fix the issue, a range of solutions were implemented, including fixing the hack, removing the theme while keeping the build intact, using an AI image optimization tool, enabling multi-layer caching, moving the host to a more powerful platform, replacing heavy plugins with lightweight alternatives, removing sections that contributed to increased DOM elements, and enabling a CDN.

Through these efforts, the Abonemed team was able to significantly improve the speed and performance of the website, providing a better experience for users and helping the company to better serve its customers. In the following sections, we will delve into the details of these optimization efforts and the results that were achieved.

About the Brand

Abonemed Medical Equipment LLC is a UAE-based company that specializes in the supply of medical equipment. The company was founded with the goal of providing high-quality medical equipment to healthcare professionals and facilities in the UAE and the surrounding region.

The company offers a wide range of medical equipment, including diagnostic equipment, surgical instruments, hospital beds, and more. They work with leading manufacturers and suppliers to ensure that they are able to offer the latest and most advanced medical equipment to their customers.

The Problem

The companys website was hacked and filled with thousands of unwanted entries in the database, which caused a 301 redirect at the database level and made the website slow.

The Challenges

The hack had caused significant damage to the website, making it slow and difficult for users to access. The company also needed to find a way to fix the hack without losing important pages that were built using the WPBakery.

Grow your business today

Unlock your businesss full potential with innovative digital solutions, tailored strategies, and expert supportstart growing today with Stakque.

Contact Us

The Solution

The following steps were taken to optimize the websites speed and performance:

  1. The hack was fixed to ensure the security and safety of the website. This included identifying and removing any malicious code or entries in the database that were causing problems.
  2. The theme was removed while keeping the build intact. This allowed the company to save hundreds of pages that were created using the WPBakery, while still addressing the issue of the slow website.
  3. Shortpixel Adaptive Images, an AI image optimization tool, was implemented to serve images based on the users browser agent. This helped to improve the speed and performance of the website by ensuring that the appropriate images were being served to users.
  4. Multi-layer caching was enabled to further improve the websites speed. This included using WPBakery for page caching and Redis for object caching. By caching certain elements of the website, the server did not have to retrieve them every time a user visited the site, resulting in faster loading times.
  5. The host was changed to Vultr HF and Cloudways was used to manage the hosting. This provided the website with more powerful and reliable hosting, which contributed to its improved performance.
  6. The company closely evaluated its use of plugins and replaced any heavy ones with lightweight alternatives. This helped to reduce the burden on the websites server and improve its speed.
  7. To further reduce the websites DOM elements and improve its performance, certain sections that were contributing heavily to this were removed.
  8. A CDN (Content Delivery Network) was enabled to improve the websites loading times for users around the world. BunnyCDN was chosen for its increased coverage and ability to effectively deliver content to users.

The Result

These solutions helped to significantly improve the speed and performance of the Abonemed website. Users were able to access the website more quickly and efficiently, and the company was able to provide a better experience for its customers. Overall, the optimization efforts were successful in addressing the issues caused by the hack and improving the websites performance.

Conclusion

In conclusion, the optimization efforts undertaken for the Abonemed Medical Equipment LLC website were highly successful in addressing the issues caused by the hack and improving the websites speed and performance. By fixing the hack, removing the theme, using an AI image optimization tool, enabling multi-layer caching, moving the host, replacing heavy plugins, removing unnecessary sections, and enabling a CDN, the team was able to significantly improve the user experience and better serve their customers.

These efforts demonstrate the importance of regularly reviewing and optimizing a websites performance, particularly in the face of challenges such as a hack. By taking a proactive and comprehensive approach, it is possible to significantly improve the websites speed and performance, providing a better experience for users and helping the business to thrive.

this case study, we will be exploring the optimization efforts that were undertaken to improve the speed and performance of the Abonemed Medical Equipment LLC website. The company\u2019s website had been hacked and filled with thousands of unwanted entries in the database, causing it to run slow and negatively impacting the user experience.<\/p><p>To fix the issue, a range of solutions were implemented, including fixing the hack, removing the theme while keeping the build intact, using an AI image optimization tool, enabling multi-layer caching, moving the host to a more powerful platform, replacing heavy plugins with lightweight alternatives, removing sections that contributed to increased DOM elements, and enabling a CDN.<\/p><p>Through these efforts, the Abonemed team was able to significantly improve the speed and performance of the website, providing a better experience for users and helping the company to better serve its customers. In the following sections, we will delve into the details of these optimization efforts and the results that were achieved.<\/p>","ep_widget_cf_colors":"#D30C5C, #0EBCDC, #EAED41, #ED5A78, Equipment LLC is a UAE-based company that specializes in the supply of medical equipment. The company was founded with the goal of providing high-quality medical equipment to healthcare professionals and facilities in the UAE and the surrounding region.<\/p><p>The company offers a wide range of medical equipment, including diagnostic equipment, surgical instruments, hospital beds, and more. They work with leading manufacturers and suppliers to ensure that they are able to offer the latest and most advanced medical equipment to their customers.<\/p>","ep_widget_cf_colors":"#D30C5C, class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-6d91688 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor\" data-id=\"6d91688\" data-element_type=\"widget\" data-widget_type=\"text-editor.default\"><div class=\"elementor-widget-container\"><p>The following steps were taken to optimize the website\u2019s speed and performance:<\/p><\/div><\/div><div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-72f6066 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor\" data-id=\"72f6066\" data-element_type=\"widget\" data-widget_type=\"text-editor.default\"><div class=\"elementor-widget-container\"><ol class=\"wp-block-list\"><li>The hack was fixed to ensure the security and safety of the website. This included identifying and removing any malicious code or entries in the database that were causing problems.<\/li><li>The theme was removed while keeping the build intact. This allowed the company to save hundreds of pages that were created using the WPBakery, while still addressing the issue of the slow website.<\/li><li>Shortpixel Adaptive Images, an AI image optimization tool, was implemented to serve images based on the user\u2019s browser agent. This helped to improve the speed and performance of the website by ensuring that the appropriate images were being served to users.<\/li><li>Multi-layer caching was enabled to further improve the website\u2019s speed. This included using WPBakery for page caching and Redis for object caching. By caching certain elements of the website, the server did not have to retrieve them every time a user visited the site, resulting in faster loading times.<\/li><li>The host was changed to Vultr HF and Cloudways was used to manage the hosting. This provided the website with more powerful and reliable hosting, which contributed to its improved performance.<\/li><li>The company closely evaluated its use of plugins and replaced any heavy ones with lightweight alternatives. This helped to reduce the burden on the website\u2019s server and improve its speed.<\/li><li>To further reduce the website\u2019s DOM elements and improve its performance, certain sections that were contributing heavily to this were removed.<\/li><li>A CDN (Content Delivery Network) was enabled to improve the website\u2019s loading times for users around the world. BunnyCDN was chosen for its increased coverage and ability to effectively deliver content to users.<\/li><\/ol><\/div><\/div>","ep_widget_cf_colors":"#D30C5C, #0EBCDC, #EAED41, #ED5A78, class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-3e1833b elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor\" data-id=\"3e1833b\" data-element_type=\"widget\" data-widget_type=\"text-editor.default\"><div class=\"elementor-widget-container\"><p>In conclusion, the optimization efforts undertaken for the Abonemed Medical Equipment LLC website were highly successful in addressing the issues caused by the hack and improving the website\u2019s speed and performance. By fixing the hack, removing the theme, using an AI image optimization tool, enabling multi-layer caching, moving the host, replacing heavy plugins, removing unnecessary sections, and enabling a CDN, the team was able to significantly improve the user experience and better serve their customers.<\/p><p>These efforts demonstrate the importance of regularly reviewing and optimizing a website\u2019s performance, particularly in the face of challenges such as a hack. By taking a proactive and comprehensive approach, it is possible to significantly improve the website\u2019s speed and performance, providing a better experience for users and helping the business to thrive.<\/p><\/div><\/div>","ep_widget_cf_colors":"#D30C5C, #0EBCDC, #EAED41, #ED5A78, item.title: Maximizing ROI with Google Ads: An Education Consultancys Success Story
item.dc:creator: srinivas
item.content:encoded:
Customer Story

Maximizing ROI with Google Ads: An Education Consultancys Success Story

Location

San Ramon, California

Industry

EdTech

Background

The education consultancy was seeking to generate leads for their services, which included education consulting and study abroad program assistance. In order to reach potential clients, we decided to use Google Ads as a platform for advertising.

Challenges

While implementing the Google Ads campaign for the education consultancy, we encountered a few challenges, including:

  • Competition: The education consulting and study abroad program industries are competitive, and there were many other companies also using Google Ads to reach potential clients. This meant that we had to ensure that our ads were well-targeted and compelling in order to stand out and capture the attention of users.
  • Limited budget: The education consultancy had a limited budget for advertising, which meant that we had to be strategic in how we allocated our spend. This required careful planning and optimization in order to make the most of the available budget.
  • Constantly evolving algorithms: Googles algorithms are constantly evolving, which can impact the performance of ads. This required us to stay up-to-date on the latest updates and make adjustments to our campaigns as needed in order to maintain their effectiveness.

Grow your business today

Unlock your businesss full potential with innovative digital solutions, tailored strategies, and expert supportstart growing today with Stakque.

Contact Us

Strategies

  • Implemented a Google Ads campaign targeting keywords related to education consulting and study abroad programs
  • Used a combination of broad and long-tail keywords to capture a range of search queries
  • Conducted split testing of landing pages to identify the best version and increase the conversion rate
  • Utilized various optimization tools to optimize the campaign and ensure it was performing at its best
  • Ran retargeting campaigns to reach potential audience who had previously visited the website
  • Implemented conversion tracking to measure the number of leads generated and the cost per lead
  • Used targeted keywords, compelling ad copy, and optimization techniques to drive traffic to the website and generate leads for the education consultancy.

Results

Our campaigns generated 1400+ leads, with a conversion rate of 10%. The average cost per lead was just 88 INR, and the return on ad spend (ROAS) was over 1000%. This was a successful campaign for the education consultancy, resulting in a high volume of qualified leads at a low cost.

Conclusion

Google Ads was an effective platform for generating leads for the education consultancy. By targeting relevant keywords and using conversion tracking, we were able to achieve a high ROAS and a low cost per lead. This success can be attributed to the well-planned and executed Google Ads campaign.

More customer stories

Just 3 Months of SEO How We Generated Quality Leads for a Professional Training Institute
SEO

SEO

class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-fd76fb3 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor\" data-id=\"fd76fb3\" data-element_type=\"widget\" data-widget_type=\"text-editor.default\"><div class=\"elementor-widget-container\"><p>While implementing the Google Ads campaign for the education consultancy, we encountered a few challenges, including:<\/p><\/div><\/div><div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-98c962e elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor\" data-id=\"98c962e\" data-element_type=\"widget\" data-widget_type=\"text-editor.default\"><div class=\"elementor-widget-container\"><ul class=\"wp-block-list\"><li>Competition: The education consulting and study abroad program industries are competitive, and there were many other companies also using Google Ads to reach potential clients. This meant that we had to ensure that our ads were well-targeted and compelling in order to stand out and capture the attention of users.<\/li><li>Limited budget: The education consultancy had a limited budget for advertising, which meant that we had to be strategic in how we allocated our spend. This required careful planning and optimization in order to make the most of the available budget.<\/li><li>Constantly evolving algorithms: Google\u2019s algorithms are constantly evolving, which can impact the performance of ads. This required us to stay up-to-date on the latest updates and make adjustments to our campaigns as needed in order to maintain their effectiveness.<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div>","ep_widget_cf_colors":"#D30C5C, #0EBCDC, #EAED41, #ED5A78, item.title: Generating 686 Qualified Leads for INR 8898 Within a Month
item.dc:creator: srinivas
item.content:encoded:
Customer Story

Generating 686 Qualified Leads for INR 8898 Within a Month

Location

San Ramon, California

Industry

EdTech

At Stakque Digital Pvt. Ltd., we are always looking for ways to help our clients achieve their marketing and business goals. One of our most successful campaigns to date was for a digital academy that helps students across the country graduate from prestigious universities online. The academy was struggling with brand visibility and qualified leads, but our dedicated Facebook strategy team was able to develop an effective advertising strategy that generated amazing results.

About The Brand

Live to Smile, The digital academy we worked with is a unique and innovative platform that helps students achieve their higher education goals online. The academy offers a wide range of courses and programs from prestigious universities, allowing students to earn their degrees from the comfort of their own homes. The academy is run by a group of dedicated educators who are passionate about helping students succeed.

The Problem

Despite its high-quality services, the digital academy was struggling with brand visibility and qualified leads. The academy was bootstrapped and had a limited budget for advertising, and the profit margin was on the leaner side. The team was looking for a way to increase brand awareness and attract more qualified leads without breaking the bank.

Grow your business today

Unlock your businesss full potential with innovative digital solutions, tailored strategies, and expert supportstart growing today with Stakque.

Contact Us

The Solution

Our dedicated Facebook strategy team was up to the challenge. We developed an advertising strategy that included a variety of tactics to increase brand visibility and attract qualified leads.

We used vernacular ads to target students in their native languages, which helped increase the relevancy and effectiveness of the ads. We also used interest combinations to reach a highly qualified audience that was interested in the academys services.

To build trust and credibility for the brand, we created a testimonial video ad featuring real students discussing their positive experiences with the academy. This helped demonstrate the value and quality of the academys services.

Finally, we used advanced ad placements to carefully select the right placements for the ads, maximizing visibility and engagement with the target audience.

Results

Despite the limited budget for advertising, our campaign was a great success. We generated 686 leads for INR 8898, yielding a cost per lead (CPL) of just 12.9. This was one of the cheapest CPLs in such a competitive industry, and it helped the digital academy increase brand visibility and attract qualified leads.

Conclusion

Our dedicated Facebook strategy team was able to achieve amazing results for the digital academy, even with a shoestring budget. The success of this campaign demonstrates our teams expertise and ability to generate strong results for our clients. We are proud to have helped the digital academy increase brand visibility and attract qualified leads, and we look forward to continuing to work with them in the future.

More customer stories

Just 3 Months of SEO How We Generated Quality Leads for a Professional Training Institute
SEO

SEO

Stakque Digital Pvt. Ltd., we are always looking for ways to help our clients achieve their marketing and business goals. One of our most successful campaigns to date was for a digital academy that helps students across the country graduate from prestigious universities online. The academy was struggling with brand visibility and qualified leads, but our dedicated Facebook strategy team was able to develop an effective advertising strategy that generated amazing results.<\/p><p>\u00a0<\/p><p><img class=\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-859\" src=\"http:\/\/stakque.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2025\/03\/i3.webp\" alt=\"\" width=\"768\" height=\"669\" Facebook strategy team was up to the challenge. We developed an advertising strategy that included a variety of tactics to increase brand visibility and attract qualified leads.<\/p><p>We used vernacular ads to target students in their native languages, which helped increase the relevancy and effectiveness of the ads. We also used interest combinations to reach a highly qualified audience that was interested in the academy\u2019s services.<\/p><p>To build trust and credibility for the brand, we created a testimonial video ad featuring real students discussing their positive experiences with the academy. This helped demonstrate the value and quality of the academy\u2019s services.<\/p><p>Finally, we used advanced ad placements to carefully select the right placements for the ads, maximizing visibility and engagement with the target audience.<\/p>","ep_widget_cf_colors":"#D30C5C, #0EBCDC, #EAED41, #ED5A78, item.title: Increasing Online Sales with Google Ads: A D2C Photo Frame Business Case Study
item.dc:creator: srinivas
item.content:encoded:
Customer Story

Increasing Online Sales with Google Ads: A D2C Photo Frame Business Case Study

Location

San Ramon, California

Industry

EdTech

In this case study, we will be discussing the success of a direct-to-consumer (D2C) photo frame business based in Bangalore that implemented Google Ads campaigns. The business was able to achieve a return on ad spend (ROAS) of more than 700%, as well as 1300+ sales in just two months. Additionally, the cost per sale was reduced by 75%, down to just 89 INR.

Challenges

The D2C photo frame business was struggling to generate online sales and wanted to find a way to reach their target audience effectively. As a result, they teamed up with Stakque to manage their Google Ads campaigns in an effort to increase sales.

Background

Few challenges that we faced along the way.

  • Competition: One of the biggest challenges was the high level of competition in the online market for photo frames. With many other businesses offering similar products, it was important for us to differentiate our products and make them stand out.
  • Ad spend: Another challenge was managing ad spend effectively. With a limited budget, we had to be strategic in how we allocated our ad spend to get the best return on investment.
  • Constant optimization: In order to maintain and improve the success of our campaigns, we had to constantly optimize and adjust our strategies. This included conducting regular keyword research, analyzing performance data, and testing new ad copy and targeting options.

Grow your business today

Unlock your businesss full potential with innovative digital solutions, tailored strategies, and expert supportstart growing today with Stakque.

Contact Us

Strategy

To optimize clients Google Ads campaigns, we implemented the following strategies:

  • Split testing various versions of the landing page: To determine the best conversion rate, we split tested multiple versions of the landing page to see which one performed the best.
  • Using tools like Attention Insight for element positioning on the landing page: Attention Insight is a tool that helps us understand how users interact with website and what elements they pay the most attention to. We used this tool to position key elements on the landing page according to the psychology of our target audience.
  • Using tools like Microsoft Clarity and Mouseflow to study visitor behavior on the landing page: To further understand how users were interacting with website, we used tools like Microsoft Clarity and Mouseflow to study visitor behavior. These tools provided valuable insights into what elements were working well and what areas needed improvement.
  • Conducting n-gram analysis: We also conducted n-gram analysis, which is a technique that involves analyzing the frequency and co-occurrence of words in a text. By analyzing the language used in our ad copy and landing pages, we were able to optimize campaigns for better performance.
  • Data-driven bid adjustments: Used data to make informed decisions about our bid adjustments. By analyzing performance data, we were able to adjust our bids in real-time to ensure that client were getting the best return on our ad spend.
  • Retargeting: Implemented retargeting campaigns to target users who had previously visited our website but had not made a purchase. These campaigns helped to bring users back to our site and increase the likelihood of making a sale.

Overall, these strategies helped us to fine-tune their Google Ads campaigns and drive even better results.

Results

The Google Ads campaigns were extremely successful. In just two months, the business saw a 700% ROAS and more than 1300 sales. Additionally, the cost per sale was reduced by 75%, down to just 89 INR.

Conclusion

The use of Google Ads was a key factor in the success of the D2C photo frame business. By conducting thorough keyword research, writing compelling ad copy, targeting the right audience, and utilizing optimized landing pages and retargeting campaigns, the business was able to drive online sales and increase brand awareness.

class=\"elementor-widget-container\"><p>Few challenges that we faced along the way.<\/p><\/div><\/div><div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-4b93c71 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor\" data-id=\"4b93c71\" data-element_type=\"widget\" data-widget_type=\"text-editor.default\"><div class=\"elementor-widget-container\"><ul><li>Competition: One of the biggest challenges was the high level of competition in the online market for photo frames. With many other businesses offering similar products, it was important for us to differentiate our products and make them stand out.<\/li><li>Ad spend: Another challenge was managing ad spend effectively. With a limited budget, we had to be strategic in how we allocated our ad spend to get the best return on investment.<\/li><li>Constant optimization: In order to maintain and improve the success of our campaigns, we had to constantly optimize and adjust our strategies. This included conducting regular keyword research, analyzing performance data, and testing new ad copy and targeting options.<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div>","ep_widget_cf_colors":"#D30C5C, #0EBCDC, class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-0dc9ee5 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor\" data-id=\"0dc9ee5\" data-element_type=\"widget\" data-widget_type=\"text-editor.default\"><div class=\"elementor-widget-container\"><p>To optimize client\u2019s Google Ads campaigns, we implemented the following strategies:<\/p><\/div><\/div><div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-6c81d3f elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor\" data-id=\"6c81d3f\" data-element_type=\"widget\" data-widget_type=\"text-editor.default\"><div class=\"elementor-widget-container\"><ul class=\"wp-block-list\"><li>Split testing various versions of the landing page: To determine the best conversion rate, we split tested multiple versions of the landing page to see which one performed the best.<\/li><li>Using tools like Attention Insight for element positioning on the landing page: Attention Insight is a tool that helps us understand how users interact with website and what elements they pay the most attention to. We used this tool to position key elements on the landing page according to the psychology of our target audience.<\/li><li>Using tools like Microsoft Clarity and Mouseflow to study visitor behavior on the landing page: To further understand how users were interacting with website, we used tools like Microsoft Clarity and Mouseflow to study visitor behavior. These tools provided valuable insights into what elements were working well and what areas needed improvement.<\/li><li>Conducting n-gram analysis: We also conducted n-gram analysis, which is a technique that involves analyzing the frequency and co-occurrence of words in a text. By analyzing the language used in our ad copy and landing pages, we were able to optimize campaigns for better performance.<\/li><li>Data-driven bid adjustments: Used data to make informed decisions about our bid adjustments. By analyzing performance data, we were able to adjust our bids in real-time to ensure that client were getting the best return on our ad spend.<\/li><li>Retargeting: Implemented retargeting campaigns to target users who had previously visited our website but had not made a purchase. These campaigns helped to bring users back to our site and increase the likelihood of making a sale.<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div><div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-4694641 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor\" data-id=\"4694641\" data-element_type=\"widget\" data-widget_type=\"text-editor.default\"><div class=\"elementor-widget-container\"><p>Overall, these strategies helped us to fine-tune their Google Ads campaigns and drive even better results.<\/p><\/div><\/div>","ep_widget_cf_colors":"#D30C5C, #0EBCDC, #EAED41, #ED5A78, item.title: Google Ads Delivers Impressive ROAS for Architectural Design Firm
item.dc:creator: srinivas
item.content:encoded:
Customer Story

Google Ads Delivers Impressive ROAS for Architectural Design Firm

Location

San Ramon, California

Industry

EdTech

Background

An architectural design business, approached us for help with expanding their reach and generating more leads through digital marketing. After conducting a thorough analysis of their marketing needs, we recommended investing in Google Ads to increase brand awareness and generate the leads to the business.

Challenges

One of the main challenges we faced was developing a campaign that would effectively target potential clients while also staying within the clients budget. We also needed to find a way to stand out in a crowded and competitive market.

Strategy

To overcome these challenges, we developed a targeted Google Ads campaign that focused on specific keywords related to architectural design services in the clients local area. We also used ad extensions and specific calls to action to make the ads more compelling and to encourage people to click through to the clients website.

Grow your business today

Unlock your businesss full potential with innovative digital solutions, tailored strategies, and expert supportstart growing today with Stakque.

Contact Us

Tactics

  • Conducted keyword research to identify relevant and high-value keywords to target in the Google Ads campaign
  • Created ad groups and structured them thematically to improve the relevance and effectiveness of the ads
  • Targeted specific demographics to reach the right audience, using bid adjustment for various demographic categories to optimize the campaigns
  • Wrote compelling ad copy and designed eye-catching ads to grab the attention of potential clients
  • Used ad extensions and specific calls to action to make the ads more effective
  • Utilized various tools to optimize and monitor the campaigns, such as Google Analytics and the Google Ads Performance Grader
  • Made various data-driven changes to the campaigns, such as adjusting bids and ad copy, to optimize performance and maximize the return on investment
  • Monitored the performance of the campaigns regularly and optimized them based on the data to maximize the return on investment

Results

The campaign was highly successful, generating leads for INR 28 (Avg.CPL) and achieving an impressive 11% conversion rate. The client also saw a staggering 780% ROAS from the campaigns, far exceeding their expectations.

Conclusion

We were thrilled to be able to help our client achieve such impressive results with their Google Ads campaign. By developing a targeted and effective strategy and utilizing data-driven tactics, we were able to drive targeted traffic to the clients website and generate high-quality leads at a low cost. This case study serves as a testament to the power of digital marketing and the impact it can have on a businesss success.

More customer stories

SEO

improve the relevance and effectiveness of the ads<\/li><li>Targeted specific demographics to reach the right audience, using bid adjustment for various demographic categories to optimize the campaigns<\/li><li>Wrote compelling ad copy and designed eye-catching ads to grab the attention of potential clients<\/li><li>Used ad extensions and specific calls to action to make the ads more effective<\/li><li>Utilized various tools to optimize and monitor the campaigns, such as Google Analytics and the Google Ads Performance Grader<\/li><li>Made various data-driven changes to the item.title: From Traffic to Conversion: How We 7Xed Organic Leads for a Silicon Valley EdTech Brand
item.dc:creator: seo
item.content:encoded:
Customer Story

From Traffic to Conversion: How We 7Xed Organic Leads for a Silicon Valley EdTech Brand

Location

San Ramon, California

Industry

EdTech

Overview

A fast-growing EdTech company based in Silicon Valley approached us with a specific goal:
"We want to increase our leads from organic searchespecially for our coding courses tailored to both kids and adults."

The brand had already invested in content and had decent visibility online, but they werent seeing the ROI they expected from organic traffic. Thats where our team stepped in.

The Challenge

We began with a comprehensive SEO audit and keyword research. Within the first few months, our strategies brought in impressive growth in organic search traffic. The brand started ranking for several high-volume keywords related to coding courses.

However, there was a significant roadblock

High organic traffic, but low conversions.

Despite thousands of new visitors from search engines, the websites conversion rate remained below 1%. This mismatch between traffic and lead generation became a major concern for the client.

Our Approach: Rethinking the Organic SEO Strategy

Instead of doubling down on more content and high-volume keywords, we took a step back and analyzed the performance data more critically.

Heres what we discovered:

  • Many high-ranking, high-traffic keywords were too broad or informationalbringing in users who werent ready to take action.

  • The long-tail, low-volume keywords with clear transactional intent were driving the few leads that did convert.

With this insight, we realigned our SEO efforts to focus on relevance and search intent over just traffic volume.

Grow your business today

Unlock your businesss full potential with innovative digital solutions, tailored strategies, and expert supportstart growing today with Stakque. Contact Us

Strategic Changes Implemented

  • Refined Organic Keyword Targeting
    We prioritized keywords that reflected purchase or inquiry intentlike "online coding courses for kids with certification" or "weekend coding classes for working professionals."

  • Content Pruning & Optimization
    We removed or repurposed generic blog posts and landing pages that attracted unqualified traffic. Instead, we focused on content that matched our newly identified high-intent keywords.

  • Landing Page Revamp
    Pages were optimized for conversion, with improved messaging, clearer CTAs, and better alignment with what users were actually searching for on Google.

  • On-Page UX Improvements
    From form placements to page load speeds and mobile responsiveness, we ensured the experience was frictionless from organic search to sign-up.

Results

Within just a few months of executing the revamped organic SEO strategy, the brand began seeing transformative results:

  • Conversion Rate Increased from <1% to 6%

  • 7X Increase in Organic Leads per Month

  • Higher Quality Visitors with Clearer Intent

  • Reduced Bounce Rates and Wasted Clicks

Key Takeaway

More organic traffic isnt always betterthe right organic traffic is what drives results.

By focusing on search intent and aligning our SEO strategy to attract qualified visitors, we turned stagnant traffic into scalable lead growth for the EdTech brand.

Within the first few months, our strategies brought in impressive growth in <strong data-start=\"802\" data-end=\"828\">organic search traffic<\/strong>. The brand started ranking for several high-volume keywords related to coding courses.<\/p><p class=\"\" data-start=\"917\" data-end=\"960\">However, there was a significant roadblock\u2026<\/p><p class=\"\" data-start=\"917\" data-end=\"960\"><strong data-start=\"964\" data-end=\"1010\">High organic traffic, but low conversions.<\/strong><\/p><p class=\"\" data-start=\"1012\" data-end=\"1208\">Despite thousands of new visitors from search engines, the website\u2019s <strong data-start=\"1081\" data-end=\"1118\">conversion rate remained below 1%<\/strong>. data-start=\"1270\" data-end=\"1407\">Instead of doubling down on more content and high-volume keywords, we took a step back and analyzed the performance data more critically.<\/p><p class=\"\" data-start=\"1409\" data-end=\"1435\">Here\u2019s what we discovered:<\/p><ul data-start=\"1436\" data-end=\"1688\"><li class=\"\" data-start=\"1436\" data-end=\"1566\"><p class=\"\" data-start=\"1438\" data-end=\"1566\">Many high-ranking, high-traffic keywords were <strong data-start=\"1484\" data-end=\"1514\">too broad or informational<\/strong>\u2014bringing in users who weren\u2019t ready to take action.<\/p><\/li><li class=\"\" data-start=\"1567\" data-end=\"1688\"><p class=\"\" data-start=\"1569\" data-end=\"1688\">The <strong data-start=\"1573\" data-end=\"1607\">long-tail, low-volume keywords<\/strong> with <strong data-start=\"1613\" data-end=\"1643\">clear transactional intent<\/strong> were driving the few leads that did convert.<\/p><\/li><\/ul><p class=\"\" data-start=\"1690\" data-end=\"1807\">With this insight, we realigned our SEO efforts to focus on <strong data-start=\"1750\" data-end=\"1781\">relevance and search intent<\/strong> over just traffic volume.<\/p>","ep_widget_cf_colors":"#D30C5C, #0EBCDC, #EAED41, #ED5A78, class=\"wp-block-list\"><li class=\"\" data-start=\"1849\" data-end=\"2076\"><p class=\"\" data-start=\"1852\" data-end=\"2076\"><strong data-start=\"1852\" data-end=\"1889\">Refined Organic Keyword Targeting<\/strong><br data-start=\"1889\" data-end=\"1892\" \/>We prioritized keywords that reflected <strong data-start=\"1934\" data-end=\"1964\">purchase or inquiry intent<\/strong>\u2014like \"online coding courses for kids with certification\" or \"weekend coding classes for working professionals.\"<\/p><\/li><li class=\"\" data-start=\"2078\" data-end=\"2305\"><p class=\"\" data-start=\"2081\" data-end=\"2305\"><strong data-start=\"2081\" data-end=\"2115\">Content Pruning & Optimization<\/strong><br data-start=\"2115\" data-end=\"2118\" \/>We removed or repurposed generic blog posts and landing pages that attracted unqualified traffic. Instead, we focused on content that matched our newly identified high-intent keywords.<\/p><\/li><li class=\"\" data-start=\"2307\" data-end=\"2494\"><p class=\"\" data-start=\"2310\" data-end=\"2494\"><strong data-start=\"2310\" data-end=\"2333\">Landing Page Revamp<\/strong><br data-start=\"2333\" data-end=\"2336\" \/>Pages were optimized for <strong data-start=\"2364\" data-end=\"2378\">conversion<\/strong>, with improved messaging, clearer CTAs, and better alignment with what users were actually searching for on Google.<\/p><\/li><li class=\"\" data-start=\"2496\" data-end=\"2678\"><p class=\"\" data-start=\"2499\" data-end=\"2678\"><strong data-start=\"2499\" data-end=\"2526\">On-Page UX Improvements<\/strong><br data-start=\"2526\" data-end=\"2529\" \/>From form placements to page load speeds and mobile responsiveness, we ensured the experience was frictionless from <strong data-start=\"2648\" data-end=\"2677\">organic search to sign-up<\/strong>.<\/p><\/li><\/ul>","ep_widget_cf_colors":"#D30C5C, #0EBCDC, #EAED41, #ED5A78, item.title: From 1.5K to 19.8K Clicks, 834% More Engagement & 2.6K Keywords Ranked in 90 Days
item.dc:creator: srinivas
item.content:encoded:
Customer Story

From 1.5K to 19.8K Clicks, 834% More Engagement & 2.6K Keywords Ranked in 90 Days

Location

Canada

Industry

Home Appliance Repair Services

Overview

A well-established home appliance repair service provider in Canada partnered with us to address critical challenges in digital visibility and lead generation. Despite offering essential repair services, the brands online presence was underperforming, resulting in low search rankings, minimal conversions, and a lack of engagement. Within 90 days, we executed a tailored SEO and UX strategy that led to a 7X increase in organic conversions and over 2,600 keyword rankings.

Key Challenges

  • Poor search engine visibility (Average position: 32.6)
  • Limited organic traffic: 1,510 clicks and 203,000 impressions over 3 months
  • Low click-through rate (CTR): 0.7%
  • Only 120 conversions across forms, calls, and bookings
  • No rankings for high-intent service-related keywords
  • Minimal presence in local SERP features such as Maps, Snippets, and FAQs

Strategic Objectives

  • Improve organic visibility across local and high-intent keywords
  • Enhance website structure, performance, and user experience
  • Increase qualified service inquiries through SEO-led conversion optimization
  • Strengthen local SEO authority and trust signals

Grow your business today

Unlock your businesss full potential with innovative digital solutions, tailored strategies, and expert supportstart growing today with Stakque. Contact Us

Our Approach

1. Search-Intent Focused SEO

  • Identified and targeted high-conversion, location-specific keywords
  • Created new service area pages and optimized existing content
  • Enhanced meta titles, descriptions, and schema to improve SERP visibility

2. Technical SEO & Site Performance

  • Resolved crawl issues and improved site indexing
  • Optimized page speed and mobile responsiveness
  • Implemented structured data for services, FAQs, and reviews

3. UX Enhancements & Conversion Optimization

  • Redesigned conversion paths with clear CTAs
  • Integrated quote forms, mobile click-to-call buttons, and booking options
  • Implemented comprehensive event tracking through GA4

4. Local SEO and Authority Building

  • Optimized Google Business Profile with updated details and visuals
  • Built citations across relevant directories
  • Acquired niche-relevant backlinks to improve domain authority

Results Achieved (Nov 1, 2024 Jan 31, 2025 vs. previous 3 months)

  • +7X increase in organic conversions
  • 2,600+ keywords ranked
  • CTR increased from 0.7% to 2.5%
  • Top rankings achieved for key local service keywords
  • Significant growth in Maps and FAQ visibility on Google SERPs
  • More than 300 tracked service inquiries (calls, forms, bookings)

Key Takeaway

This project demonstrates that effective SEO goes beyond rankings it's about aligning strategy with user intent, improving technical infrastructure, and optimizing for conversions. By focusing on high-impact SEO interventions and user-first design improvements, the brand transitioned from low online visibility to becoming a high-converting, search-visible service leader in just 90 days.

item.title: From Visibility to Sales: How We 3Xed Conversions & 4Xed Traffic in 6 Months
item.dc:creator: srinivas
item.content:encoded:
Customer Story

From Visibility to Sales: How We 3Xed Conversions & 4Xed Traffic in 6 Months

Location

India

Industry

E-commerce Personalized Photo Frames & Home Dcor

Overview

An emerging e-commerce store specializing in customized photo frames and home dcor was facing a visibility crisis. While the website was visually appealing and product quality was strong, the brand struggled to attract organic traffic or convert visits into sales. The core issue was clear: the business wasnt ranking where it mattered.

The Challenges

Before our engagement, the store faced several bottlenecks:
  • Low organic traffic and minimal online discovery
  • Poor rankings for buyer-intent keywords
  • No structured tracking to attribute conversions from search
  • Below-average CTR (1.8%) and weak presence in SERP features
  • Organic revenue limited to 78,507 in the baseline period

Objectives

Our strategy was focused and measurable:
  • Increase organic traffic and keyword rankings
  • Optimize conversion paths and trackable metrics
  • Strengthen product and category page visibility
  • Triple organic revenue within six months

Grow your business today

Unlock your businesss full potential with innovative digital solutions, tailored strategies, and expert supportstart growing today with Stakque. Contact Us

Strategic Execution

1. E-Commerce SEO Cleanup

  • Optimized product titles, meta descriptions, alt text, and URLs
  • Built and structured buyer-intent landing pages for key themes and occasions

2. Technical & Performance Enhancements

  • Fixed mobile usability and duplicate content issues
  • Improved page speed and achieved Core Web Vitals benchmarks

3. Conversion Tracking & Funnel Optimization

  • Integrated GA4 tracking for product clicks, add-to-carts, and purchases
  • Refined CTAs, added trust badges, and streamlined the checkout journey

4. Content Strategy for Product Discovery

  • Enriched product and category pages with keyword-focused content
  • Created seasonal and gifting-focused blog articles for supplemental traffic

5. SERP Feature Optimization

  • Implemented structured data for reviews, products, and FAQs
  • Achieved featured snippets and product carousel visibility

Results (AprOct 2024 vs. Pre-SEO Baseline)

KPI Before After % Growth
Organic Clicks ~4.5K 18K 3
Impressions ~250K 1.01M 3.04
Average CTR 1.20% 1.80% 0.5
Avg. Position 24.7 14.8 9.9 positions
Monthly Revenue (Organic) 78,507 2,47,340 2.15
Conversions via Search 40 126 2.15

Key Takeaway

This project shows that in e-commerce, its not about producing volume its about optimizing visibility where it counts. By targeting buyer-intent keywords, improving the user journey, and focusing SEO efforts on product discoverability, the store turned organic traffic into a major revenue stream, achieving over 3X sales growth within six months.

More customer stories

SEO

SEO

item.title: Winning Googles Top Spot in 3 Months: A Case Study in Beating E-commerce Giants
item.dc:creator: srinivas
item.content:encoded:
Customer Story

Winning Googles Top Spot in 3 Months: A Case Study in Beating E-commerce Giants

Location

Global (with focus on US, UAE, Europe)

Industry

Cross-border E-commerce & International ShippingIn a search landscape ruled by global giants like Amazon, Myntra, and Ajio, its easy to assume theres no room left for smaller players. But in just 90 days, a niche cross-border shopping platform not only entered the gameit took over the #1 positions for more than 100 high-intent search queries.

The result?

107K organic clicks 3.96M impressions Top rankings for shipping-related keywords 45% increase in sales directly attributed to SEO

The Market Reality

Global usersespecially in countries like the USA and Sri Lankaare frequently searching questions like:
  • Does Myntra ship to USA?
  • Ajio international delivery?
  • How to order from Indian shopping sites abroad?
And yet, none of the dominant platforms had created clear, answerable pages for these queries.That was the opportunity.

The Core SEO Problem

Despite offering a truly valuable service, this brand was suffering from:
  • Low organic visibility
  • Minimal ranking for transactional search queries
  • Generic landing pages that didnt match user intent
  • Zero featured snippet or FAQ placements
Meanwhile, competitors had sheer brand powerbut were ignoring thousands of monthly searches from global shoppers.

Grow your business today

Unlock your businesss full potential with innovative digital solutions, tailored strategies, and expert supportstart growing today with Stakque.

Contact Us

The Strategic Turnaround

Step 1: Audience Intent Discovery

We tapped into tools like Google Search Console, Ahrefs, and Reddit to map real-world search questions: Can I buy from Ajio if I live in the US? How do I get Myntra items shipped internationally? Does Amazon India deliver outside India?Grouped themes:
  • Brand-specific shipping queries
  • General international shopping concerns
  • Cross-border logistics questions

Step 2: Micro-Intent Landing Pages

We created dedicated landing pages for each questionnot a catch-all FAQ. Examples:
  • /does-myntra-ship-to-usa
  • /ajio-international-shipping
  • /how-to-order-from-india-online
Each page was structured with:
  • Conversational H1s
  • Rich supporting FAQs
  • Schema markup for rich snippets
  • Clear CTAs linking to actual shipping services

Step 3: SERP Feature Optimization

We aimed for SERP dominance, not just ranking:
  • FAQ schema to secure "People Also Ask" visibility
  • Featured snippet targeting with concise answers
  • URL slugs aligned with exact-match queries

Step 4: Conversion Support

Getting traffic was only half the battlewe focused on conversions too:
  • Region-wise delivery timelines
  • Embedded user reviews
  • Sticky mobile CTAs
  • Instant support/chat triggers

Results After 90 Days

  • 107K total clicks
  • 3.96M impressions
  • 2.7% CTR
  • Average Position: 18.7
  • Sharp spike in both impressions and clicks in the final 3 weeks
  • High conversion rate on targeted landing pages
Performance Snapshot from Google Search Console:

Sample Keywords Ranked at Position #1

We achieved top rankings for some of the most valuable, competitive keywords in the cross-border e-commerce niche.Heres the proofranking #1 against major platforms like Amazon, Ajio, and Myntra:These werent low-volume keywords. These were commercial, high-intent queries where the user was ready to convert.

Why It Worked

This wasnt about outspending the competition. It was about strategy, speed, and search intent.We didnt fight them on product or price. We outmaneuvered them in:
  • User-first content that directly answered search queries
  • Intent-mapped pages optimized for both CTR and conversion
  • SERP positioning that built brand trust with users

Final Thoughts

Organic search doesnt reward size. It rewards precision. Intent. Speed to execution.In just three months, this brand claimed high-intent search equity many companies spend years chasing.If your SEO isnt converting searches into solutions, youre leaving revenue on the table.

More customer stories

SEO

Just 3 Months of SEO How We Generated Quality Leads for a Professional Training Institute
SEO

19x ROI: How a Company in the Electrical Equipment Manufacturing Industry Achieved 1 Crore Revenue with SEO in 6 Months
SEO

Winning Googles Top Spot in 3 Months: A Case Study in Beating E-commerce Giants

item.title: 19x ROI: How a Company in the Electrical Equipment Manufacturing Industry Achieved 1 Crore Revenue with SEO in 6 Months
item.dc:creator: srinivas
item.content:encoded:
Customer Story

19x ROI: How a Company in the Electrical Equipment Manufacturing Industry Achieved 1 Crore Revenue with SEO in 6 Months

Location

Mumbai, India

Industry

Electrical Equipment Manufacturing

Background & Business Goals

The client, a leading manufacturer and supplier of digital surge testers and electrical testing equipment, wanted to scale their online presence to generate qualified B2B leads and increase direct sales. Despite having high-quality industrial products and a solid offline reputation, their digital visibility was limited.The primary business goals included:
  • Generating high-intent leads through organic traffic
  • Ranking for industry-specific keywords
  • Establishing topical authority in the electrical equipment space
  • Achieving measurable ROI from digital channels

SEO Challenges Faced

  • Poor Technical SEO Health: The website suffered from broken links, slow loading speeds, and a non-optimized mobile experience.
  • Low Organic Visibility: The domain had minimal keyword rankings, most of which were low-volume and non-commercial.
  • Lack of Optimized Content: Most product pages had thin or duplicated content. There were no blog resources targeting informational or problem-solving queries.
  • Unclear Site Architecture: The website lacked a clear structure, making it difficult for search engines to crawl and index effectively.
  • Competitive Market: Competing against established B2B industrial brands that had invested heavily in SEO for years.

Strategy & Execution

To tackle these challenges and position the brand as a leading industrial supplier, we rolled out a comprehensive SEO roadmap across three core areas:

1. SEO Audit & Benchmarking

We began by conducting a complete SEO audit, identifying over 50 technical and content issues. Benchmarked current performance using tools like Google Search Console, Ahrefs, and GA4.

2. Industry-Specific Keyword Research

A detailed keyword map was developed, focusing on product-specific terms (e.g., "digital surge tester," "industrial hipot tester") and high-conversion long-tail phrases. Keywords were clustered based on search intent and business value.3. Content-Driven Authority BuildingWe built an editorial calendar with pillar topics and supporting content clusters targeting engineers, procurement heads, and technical buyers. Each blog was optimized for semantic relevance, schema markup, and user engagement.

Grow your business today

Unlock your businesss full potential with innovative digital solutions, tailored strategies, and expert supportstart growing today with Stakque.

Contact Us

Technical SEO Fixes

  • Site Speed Optimization: Reduced load time by over 60% through image compression, lazy loading, and code minification.
  • Mobile Responsiveness: Implemented a mobile-first responsive design overhaul to align with Googles mobile indexing priorities.
  • Core Web Vitals Improvements: Achieved a passing score on all three Core Web Vitals metrics.
  • Structured Data Implementation: Added product schema, FAQ schema, and breadcrumb markup for enhanced SERP appearance.
  • URL Optimization & Internal Linking: Revamped URL structure and added contextual internal links to guide search bots and users alike.

Content Marketing & Keyword Strategy

  • Product Page Optimization: Rewrote all product descriptions with high-conversion keywords, clear benefits, and technical specs.
  • Blog Content Creation: Published over 15 in-depth blogs targeting use-cases, comparisons, FAQs, and buyer guides (e.g., "How to Choose the Right Surge Tester").
  • Topical Authority: Focused on building clusters around surge protection devices, electrical safety, and industrial testing equipment.

Performance Metrics & Growth Trends (6-Month Snapshot)

Metric Before SEO After 6 Months
Monthly Organic Traffic 120 4,500+
Keywords in Top 10 Results 4 93
Monthly Qualified Leads ~2 60+
B2B Clients Closed 1 in 3 months 16 total
Revenue from SEO 0 1 Crore+
Return on Investment (ROI) 19x

Key Takeaways

This case study is proof that SEO can be a powerful growth lever even in highly technical B2B industries. By aligning content with user intent, optimizing the website for conversions, and building authority in a specific niche, we turned a low-traffic site into a revenue-generating asset.

More customer stories

Just 3 Months of SEO How We Generated Quality Leads for a Professional Training Institute
SEO

SEO

Winning Googles Top Spot in 3 Months: A Case Study in Beating E-commerce Giants

old-record-id-ZyuDdTVfGo9QoNxXXDHuygE6s3b\">The primary business goals included:<\/div><ul><li>Generating high-intent leads through organic traffic<\/li><li>Ranking for industry-specific data-docx-has-block-data=\"false\"><ul><li><strong>Poor Technical SEO Health:<\/strong> The website suffered from broken links, slow loading speeds, and a non-optimized mobile experience.<\/li><li><strong>Low Organic Visibility:<\/strong> The domain had minimal keyword rankings, most of which were low-volume and non-commercial.<\/li><li><strong>Lack of Optimized Content:<\/strong> Most product pages had thin or duplicated content. There were no blog resources targeting informational or problem-solving queries.<\/li><li><strong>Unclear Site Architecture:<\/strong> The website lacked a clear structure, making it difficult for search engines to crawl and index effectively.<\/li><li><strong>Competitive Market:<\/strong> Competing against established B2B industrial brands that had invested heavily in SEO for years.<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div><\/div><\/div><\/div><\/div>","ep_widget_cf_colors":"#D30C5C, #0EBCDC, #EAED41, #ED5A78, data-docx-has-block-data=\"false\"><div class=\"ace-line ace-line old-record-id-F7ISdJ11Po7jbGx4tw5ug8C1soe\">To tackle these challenges and position the brand as a leading industrial supplier, we rolled out a comprehensive SEO roadmap across three core areas:<\/div><div>\u00a0<\/div><p><strong>1. SEO Audit & Benchmarking<\/strong><\/p><div class=\"ace-line ace-line old-record-id-N4rddda46oaA2QxwWWwuobR1s9c\">We began by conducting a complete SEO audit, identifying over 50 technical and content issues. Benchmarked current performance using tools like Google Search Console, Ahrefs, and GA4.<\/div><div>\u00a0<\/div><p><strong>2. Industry-Specific Keyword Research<\/strong><\/p><div class=\"ace-line ace-line old-record-id-QpTndnn2CoJ3u2xavlouxW5gsUf\">A detailed keyword map was developed, focusing on product-specific terms (e.g., \"digital surge tester,\" \"industrial hipot tester\") and high-conversion long-tail phrases. Keywords were clustered based on search intent and business value.<\/div><div>\u00a0<\/div><div><strong>3. Content-Driven Authority Building<\/strong><\/div><div>\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"ace-line ace-line old-record-id-R2oudDZhBoLFfGxIO4ruREdxs4b\">We built an editorial calendar with pillar topics and supporting content clusters targeting engineers, procurement heads, and technical buyers.
